title: 1 - Why Gay Marriage Is Good For The Church
description:
We launch the VOX podcast by discussing the church’s response to the Supreme Court ruling regarding same-sex marriage and the challenge of Jesus to his followers to move beyond the polarities and politics of the “issue” and back to loving and serving people. Much of the church’s approach to the “cultural wars” is not of Jesus; a better way forward must be found.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - http://apple.co/1Lla1Nj

Follow Mike on Twitter www.twitter.com/mikeerre
Like Mike on Facebook www.facebook.com/officialmikeerre
